channel.title: NTScape Will Return! //. Coming Soon
channel.description:
The Return Of NTScape!!!!
Hey guys im nick from NTScape. Back in 2009 we were one of the hottest servers. And we will be returning on a new server with custom coding a few months in the works. It will be 508 and one of the best servers to return to the moparscape community. Full updates as we continue to edit the server getting ready for the release in the next two months. So make sure to subscribe(watch) to this post for all the updates of our progress and be ready for the return of our amazing server. My partner and I both have 3 years with java C++ coding experience so be expecting an amazing server. Again pictures will be updated as we work. Thanks For Reading, Nick

item.title: NTScape Will Return! //. Coming Soon
item.dc:creator: @PdDub PdDub
item.description:
@PdDub wrote:

It might be like PropaneScape, It was good back in 08’ but sometime during '09, I believe they got DDOSed and werent back online for long long time. Moral of story: don’t listen.

Read full topic
